title: Easy Light (Flashlight)
summary: Free flashlight application. Works on all devices. Quick and Simple.
description: Click to light, click again to return. Simple as that!Easy Light is a quick and simple 100% free flashlight application for all types of devices, phones, tablets etc. Includes Strobe/Blinking light modes, Torch/Flashlight modes and Screen Lights for use with tablets. These features combined with automatic max brightness in both Screen Light modes and Torch/Flashlight modes makes Easy Light one of the best flashlight applications out there. Features: - 100% Free. No crap. No ads. No nothing. Just a really good flashlight app. - Strobe / Blinking, Torch / Flashlight, Notification shortcut, Quick launch - Insanely bright flashlight - Insanely bright screen light - Quick and Simple UI - Android Wear Support - Red screen light for night use - White screen light for devices without LED light - LED Torch/Flashlight feature (Requires LED light) - LED Strobe/Blinking feature (Requires LED light) - Launch the flashlight or screen light when app starts - Notification shortcuts to launch the flashlight/screen lightSupports Android 2.2 or newer
descriptionHTML:
Click to light, click again to return. Simple as that!

Easy Light is a quick and simple 100% free flashlight application for all types of devices, phones, tablets etc. Includes Strobe/Blinking light modes, Torch/Flashlight modes and Screen Lights for use with tablets. These features combined with automatic max brightness in both Screen Light modes and Torch/Flashlight modes makes Easy Light one of the best flashlight applications out there.

Features:
- 100% Free. No crap. No ads. No nothing. Just a really good flashlight app.
- Strobe / Blinking, Torch / Flashlight, Notification shortcut, Quick launch
- Insanely bright flashlight
- Insanely bright screen light
- Quick and Simple UI
- Android Wear Support
- Red screen light for night use
- White screen light for devices without LED light
- LED Torch/Flashlight feature (Requires LED light)
- LED Strobe/Blinking feature (Requires LED light)
- Launch the flashlight or screen light when app starts
- Notification shortcuts to launch the flashlight/screen light


Supports Android 2.2 or newer
comments: No ads, very simple, I like it. Great job.
Ad free! Versatile! Props to the dev for this fantastic little utility!
Not bad but... I think using gadget to quick launch fl is better
Does the job as required simply.
recentChanges: - Lots of bugfixes causing the app to crash fixed!
- Support for screens smaller than 3.4" improved
